title: JOBS职业插件,在哪设置限制每小时收入疲劳值
author: gxdn
txt_content:
JOBS职业插件,很好的一款插件,可以让玩家加入职业赚取工资
但现在我遇到一个问题,就是玩家可以一直干一件事赚工资,我记得这个插件是有疲劳值的,工作一定时间就会停止付工资
请各位大佬指点一下在哪设置,此插件的贴子地下附在下一行,内有的教程也仔细看了但没找到在哪设置
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=689246
谢谢指点,30金粒不要赚少.

replies.author: MineCrocodile
replies.txt_content:
generalConfig文件
Limit:
    # Money gain limit
    # With this enabled, players will be limited how much they can make in defined time
    # Time in seconds: 60 = 1min, 3600 = 1 hour, 86400 = 24 hours
    Money:
      Use: true
      # Do you want to stop money gain when exp limit reached?是否在经验上限达到时停止获得金币
      StopWithExp: false
      # Do you want to stop money gain when point limit reached?是否在点数上限达到时停止获得金币
      StopWithPoint: false
      # Equation to calculate max limit. Option to use totallevel to include players total amount levels of current jobs
      # You can always use simple number to set money limit
      # Default equation is: 500+500*(totallevel/100), this will add 1% from 500 for each level player have
      # So player with 2 jobs with level 15 and 22 will have 685 limit
      # 金币上限计算公式
      MoneyLimit: 500+500*(totallevel/100)
      # Time in seconds: 60 = 1min, 3600 = 1 hour, 86400 = 24 hours 设置多长时间内达到上述上限时停止收获金币
      TimeLimit: 86400
      # Delay between announcements about reached money limit 通知玩家已达金币上限的时间间隔
      # Keep this from 30 to 5 min (300), as players can get annoyed of constant message displaying
      AnnouncmentDelay: 30复制代码
